Text: Is this issue apparent in FSX w/Acceleration?
Does this work or not? Or does it fuck up Fsx totally?

This fixes the crash-to-desktop issue within FSX that randomly occurs when you access a menu. This seems to be more of an issue with Vista/Win7 than XP.

To install, simply copy the uiautomation.dll file to your \FSX directory. To uninstall, delete it.
